EmailTemplate.description: Email to Lower Campus Parents about outdoor play area
EmailTemplate.name: Outdoor play area.
EmailTemplate.subject: Outdoor play area in Lower Campus
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find attached letter about Outdoor play area in Lower Campus.
Уважаемые родители,
В приложение, пожалуйста, найдите письмо касательно игровой площадки в здании детского сада.
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
